text: Science https://t.co/k3xK5socB4 reported a #chloroquine #COVID19 therapy trial was halted over risk of fatal heart complications. In our @ToxSci publication https://t.co/PLJEkDFPxw, we ID'd it caused prolonged QT & QRS, AV blocks, cardiomyopathy, cardiac hypertrophy. #toxicology https://t.co/sIYysdDiDC
